TopicTitle: K9SNIPER: IT'S A GUNDAM (AMPHIBIOUStoacertaindegree VTOL with LITHOBRAKING LEGS)

Articles.Content:
TinyBuilder presents

in cooperation with Munaheim Electronics and KEELE

The second(?) in humanoid defense machinery and technology:

The K9SNIPER

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download

Abusing the brand new, powerful reaction wheels, the K9SNIPER is capable of floating lazily through the air with its twin aerospikes. Actually maneuvering with it, however, is a totally different beast. Landing it successfully? Forget about it unless you're highly experienced with severely imbalanced VTOLs. What it does, however, is look like something out of a sci-fi movie or something. Which means it's badass. I mean, VTOL jump jets are good and all, but chicks dig giant robots. That means, the K9SNIPER, despite its terrible handling, inexplicably short range, and incapacity to actually hit anything with what little armament it carries is STILL superior to your immaculately built harrier jump jet replica that somehow got to orbit under its own power. Warranty void if used for hunting the space kraken. Warranty void if you thought this was the Scopedog. Warranty void if you equip it with a beam rifle.

Edited August 6, 2013 by littlebattler

I don't think most people can see it and/or will mind anyways. It's not even displayed anywhere on the page.

I don't think most people can see it and/or will mind anyways. It's not even displayed anywhere on the page.

No offense, but yes it is. It could be a mobile thing.

I dont see anything harmfull there.

It's the title of the imgur album, which shouldn't be visible until one decides to go to the album page on imgur, so I have no idea what that guy is on.

Besides, I wasn't logged onto imgur when I made the album, so there's not much I can do about it.

Well, it is visible on mobile.

Yes, trust me, it's not intentional. I have never opened imgur galleries with a mobile browser, so I have no idea that would happen. As it is, when seen from a non-mobile computing device browser, the offending parts cannot be seen in this very page. You may argue that I should think about mobile users, but I had no idea of what a mobile user sees and to be fair, it's not exactly the first thing that comes to mind when posting in an internet discussion forum as mobile devices are often not too comfortable to do a lot of reading on.

Funny and typical. An awesomely creative craft gets posted then 20 Kerbal Police pounce. FWIW I think I saw a new MOD that automatically balanced VTOLs. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/29387-Plugin-0-20-2-KerbCom-Avionics-0-2-0-1-(July-2013)-includes-VTOL-balancing
The thing is quite balanced as long as you have SAS on and it's not under full throttle. Go full throttle and it does frontflips though. I'll take a look at the mod nonetheless.
I'm just in it for the fun. Make some video if you have time. Awesome!
